title: Majutsushi Orphen Hagure Tabi (Sorcerous Stabber Orphen)
synopsis: In a world of magic and monsters, Krylancelo Finrandi and his foster sister Azalea Cait-Sith were once promising students of sorcery, prodigies at the famous Tower of Fangs. But an experiment gone horribly wrong warps Azalea's appearance, trapping her in the form of a dragon.
related_anime: ['Majutsushi Orphen Hagure Tabi', 'Majutsushi Orphen: Revenge', 'Majutsushi Orphen', 'Majutsushi Orphen Hagure Tabi: Tennin no Isan']
